other_tests.findings: Active vasculitis with ischemic damage to the nerve and acute axonal degeneration.
Acute inflammatory myopathy with ongoing muscle-fiber destruction and regeneration, as well as vasculitis and early changes of secondary neurogenic atrophy.
Features of an asymmetric, axonal sensory and motor polyneuropathy, primarily affecting the legs but also involving the left arm.
Immediate virologic response, resolution of fever, and moderate improvement in neuropathic symptoms.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Plasma exchange was discontinued after several weeks.
